questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment.
prepare Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the equipment to another place where the AC Voltage of 230 is provided
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective.

videos.src: assets/videos/CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD.mp4
videos.videoName: CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of fuses and confirm whether the fuses are defective.
replace the fuses with a new one
check and confirm whether the Input 230 V AC is available.
check for any carbon formation or breakage of Input pin connector.
replace or clean the Input pin connector accordingly
check whether the output of 15 VDC is available at the power supply board.
repair / replace the power supply board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the power supply board

questions.question: repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the display is getting ON but appears blank
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable between the display board and control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
replace the display with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist.
repair / replace the control board accordingly
Check and confirm whether the print of ECG is improper or dull.
place the paper roll properly and check whether the problem still persist.
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean the thermal head for any dust / obstructions and check whether the problem still persist.
replace the thermal head with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the thermal Head

questions.question: check and confirm whether the paper is not rolling during the ECG is taken.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether there is any dust / obstructions / breakage of the gears.
clean / replace the gears accordingly
replace the motor with a new one
check and confirm whether READY indicator does not light up after switching on.
check the cable connection between the connecter and patient body for improper placing.
place the cable properly
check for any carbon formation / breakage of cable pin connector.
clean / replace the pin connector accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether some of the buttons do not respond while pressing
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the connecting cable from key pad to control board for any loose connection or breakage of cable.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
replace the keypad with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist
repair / replace the control board with a new one.
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
